{{ja-noun|おおとり|hhira=おほとり}}

# {{altspell|lang=ja|大鳥|tr=ōtori|nodot=1|sort=おおとり}}: any [[large]] [[bird]] {{gl|[[crane]], [[stork]], [[swan]], etc.}}; a [[fabled]], [[legendary]], or [[mythological]] [[bird]] {{gl|''{{w|fenghuang}}'', ''{{w|Peng (mythology)|peng}}'', [[phoenix]], [[roc]], etc.}}
